description: This file declares external API functions for the Lpcco Udp component within the ANSC framework, including creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization functions.

methods.name: AnscCreateLpccoUdp
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Lpcco Udp component with specified container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: AnscLpccoUdpCreate
methods.description: Initializes an instance of the Lpcco Udp component with specified contexts.

methods.name: AnscLpccoUdpRemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the specified Lpcco Udp component instance.

methods.name: AnscLpccoUdpEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the Lpcco Udp component.
